Gangon holds his chesy in pain..the shield was broken now, and his spark was
unprotected.....as brave as he was, though, he shot out 4 autoguns....he
spun his machine guns, he liked to shoot with his eyes closed, so he had
nothing to fear.......he made sure that no bot came to destroy BrightBlade,
he himself had got strangled for her, earlier, that huge bot Suukie is on a
rampage or something!.....he ran up and fired upon the autoguns again,
destroying 2 more........he dug a hole under the base so everyone could
tunnel underneath...he sighed with pain, he had put up such a fight, and now
he was weakining, he realized that the hole was not big enough, so he kept
digging........his digging was getting slower by the minute, and he kept a
constant eye on BrightBlade, he always worried about her, it was his job, as
far as he was concerned, to protect her at all costs......he digged
more...slowly, slowly.......ssslowwly.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Blue Stinger / Key (Jen D.)" <jeniff69@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 30, 2000 7:07 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Shawn, Blue Stinger has been improving the Ark for a long time before you
> joined. For all you know, there could be something that kills all the
> predacons in it with the push of a button. But that would be against the
> rules, so there isn't. So stop declaring things moding that you have no
> knowledge about.)
>
> Blue Stinger looks over at the Ark. She pushes several buttonson her wrist
> and turns back to fire at Inferno. Somewhere inside the Ark, a secondary
> energy supply turns on. The computer beeps. "Energy levels at 70% and
> rising," It says, "Teletran 1 online." The shields renew their power and
the
> autoguns resume their fire with a vengence.
>
> Several autoguns destroy some of the Ion disks that Manterror shot at
> Antagony, but the rest hit her. She stumbles back and fires at Manterror
> along with the autoguns.
>
> Key looks up from where she was sitting on the ground. She sighs. "I have
to
> get back to help the maximals. See you around, Firestorm." She says and
> walks off into the forest.
